TopicTitle: Still the scariest thing to me

Articles.Content:
The thing that keeps scaring me the most is when I go to reload a page in my profile or something and it'll tell me I don't have permission to access it, and I end up panicking I've been banned.

Then a second later I realize, it logged me out. That's when I let out a sigh of relief as I know I can forum for another day.

Anyone else in this boat occasionally?

I think the forum software limits you to two devices when staying logged in. I use two PCs regularly for forum stuff and occasionally a third one, if I use the third one then one of the others will need to be logged in again next time I use it. Are you by chance using the forums on more than two devices?

For the record, banning a person does not prevent them from logging in.
